name: Dilan vs. Trees
description:
This was originally made for Ludum Dare 42, but has since been updated.

It's a primitive first person shooter in which you must burn your way through a constantly growing forest of spooky scary skeletons in search of your friends.

Be sure to look at the game settings if you have difficulty playing. Control schemes are detailed in the game menus, but by default they are:

WASD: Move and strafe
Arrow Keys: Look around / Navigate menu / Adjust settings
Space: Use flamethrower
Q: Bend reality (when you have enough crystals)
Enter: Make selection in menu / Return to menu (In-Game)
Escape: Return to title screen

The music was made using Zandro Reveille's OPL3 soundfont (licensed under CC-BY-SA 4.0 https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/4.0/) and The Fat Man's OPL2 soundfont.
